main event: A UFO sighting reported in Gastonia, North Carolina on April 16, 1968, where a bright object was observed for 7 minutes.
interesting points: The object was bright and appeared similar to a star,The object moved steadily and swiftly without blinking,No sound was noted during the sighting,The object seemed to disappear suddenly,Witness testimony indicated the object appeared at an estimated angle of 35 degrees.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
